JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to be their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us achieve our mission. The HR Business Insights (HRBI) team drives data-based decisions to tackle strategic challenges and opportunities at Microsoft. We partner with HR Leaders and Business Leaders to help shape the workforce of the future. Our team advises HR through data-based insights and compelling storytelling to achieve business objectives and people priorities, enables deep insights for the HR partners supporting key people and organization decisions and initiatives, and partners to grow data capability and enable modern data solutions that increase HR’s impact through leveraging data. This role will enable the HRBI team strategy through skilled project management of our HR reporting solution development. In partnership with our HRBI Reporting Solutions team, you will be responsible for the development and launch of our vNext reporting solutions from ideation to launch. You will partner with our HR Center of Excellence (COE) teams to identify opportunities for improved or new reporting solutions, develop the business case and elicit requirements for the change, and partner with key stakeholders and SMEs to design, build and implement the reporting solutions.  You will be driving change that impacts the HR organization and Business Leaders, while enabling HR to effectively achieve business objectives and people priorities through data-based decision making.ResponsibilitiesResponsibilities: Lead stakeholders, subject matter experts (SMEs) and project partners through the reporting solution development process to improve scalability, performance, and the end-user experience.Develop and implement project plans; track progress and deliverables; communicate with relevant stakeholders/project sponsors/steering committees about project status and impacts.Develop business cases; partner with program owners and stakeholders for current and future state documentation to support planning and design stages of new solution development.Partner with Solution Manager on the process of requirements gathering for reporting solutions; identify risks, issues, and barriers in project execution.Coordinate user feedback, data validation and requirements validation using test cases built from requirements documentation.Develop change management plans, readiness plans, training materials and communications in partnership with program owners to ensure successful launch of reporting solutions. Develop support model and associated KB articles.Develop and report on success metrics based on program goals and requirements. Develop and implement process improvements to improve adoption, scalability, performance, and the end-user experience.Act as a thought leader in driving consistency in project management to meet performance expectations for consistency, accuracy, and timeliness of delivery. Use judgment, subject matter expertise, and proven methodologies to minimize risk.Seek opportunities for improvement within reporting solutions and processes; propose changes or adjustments to plans. Act on opportunities to increase agility, and contribute to workstreams to evolve processes, services, and solutions for simplification and automation.QualificationsRequired Qualifications: 5+ years of program/project management experience in IT, operations, or business.2+ years of experience in directly leading project management for large and small programs in Agile and traditional project lifecycles. Preferred Qualifications:Experience and proven track record of successfully managing multiple projects simultaneously. PMP certification preferredProven change management skills with Prosci® or other Change Management qualification, or demonstrated experience.Ability to translate business context and needs into technical and operational requirements.Excellent communication, inter-personal, and cross group collaboration skills.High attention to detail including proven ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously.Creative thinking and ability to design and optimize new processes and solutions.
